ZIG_ZAG.Info: Zigzag,Cold-calling ,you respond to someone contacting you out of the blue to move their pension

SPLITTER.Info: Splitter,transfer your pension to a scheme because they offer you early access to your pension

ACCELERATOR.Info: Accelerator, you engaged with a company because they offered you free financial advice
ACCELERATOR.Icon: pound signs with a cross through it

BLACK_OUT.Info: Black out, you engaged with a company because they offered a unique or limited investment opportunity

SPEEDY.Info: Speedy, you agree to something because you are told the offer has a time limit on it

DIAGONAL.Info: Diagonal, fake scammer vigilantes working on people’s fear of scams to get them to move their pension

NORMAL_SCAM.Info: Normal Scam, scammer vigilantes working on people’s fear of scams to get them to move their pension

NORMAL_BOON.Info: Normal Boon, scammer vigilantes working on people’s fear of scams to get them to move their pension

INVISIBLITY_BOON.Info: Invisiblity Boon, scammer vigilantes working on people’s fear of scams to get them to move their pension

LIFE_BOON.Info: Life Boon, scammer vigilantes working on people’s fear of scams to get them to move their pension
